courseName: Forensic Science and Crime Scene Investigation - MSc
description: Our Forensic Science & Crime Scene Investigation MSc is designed for both graduate students and forensic practitioners. You’ll develop theoretical knowledge and practical application of the key aspects of the subject.You’ll study the recovery and processing of a variety of evidence types found at crime scenes in detail, as well as the evaluation and presentation of that evidence in a legal context.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
